.. _javascript-print-page:

How to print the current page
===================

Example add to tag
--------------------



.. code-block:: javascript

	<html>
	   <head>
	      
	      <style type="css">
	      	.print_web_page{
	      	background-color:red;
	      	width:400px;
	      	height:400px;
	      	}
	      </style>
	      
	   </head>
	   
	   <body>
	   
	      <div class="print_web_page" onclick="window.print();"></div>
	   
	   </body>
	</html>


Example add to head
--------------------


.. code-block:: javascript

	<html>
	   <head>
	      
	      <style type="css">
	      	.print_web_page{
	      	background-color:red;
	      	width:400px;
	      	height:400px;
	      	}
	      </style>
	      <script>
	      	function print_web_page(){
	      		window.print();
	      	}
	      </script>
	      
	   </head>
	   
	   <body>
	   
	      <div class="print_web_page" onclick="print_web_page();">Print</div>
	   
	   </body>
	</html>

Resource
~~~~~~~~~
w3schools.com
